Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: This place is amazing, it changes its menu every 2 weeks. The staff was really helpful and friendly, the wine selection is awesome and the food was really tasty.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Gorgeous menu, many super tastes blended in great solutions. Wine expensive but beer affordable and good. Service is very good and the chef is very kind. Nice place.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: This is a small, rather unique restaurant, with excellent (if eclectic) food, wonderful service, in a great area in the Jordaan District. They do set menu only (which changes daily), and ours came with a wonderful starter platter of some ‚Ä¶

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text:
üè° elegance, cozy and romantic place to have a dinner, kitchen open concept.
üçΩ starters were delicious and trying to keep your hungry away while the chef (the star in this restaurant, cook for all dinners, yes one chef), Needs ‚Ä¶

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: This is the one that should deserve 10 stars instead of five! Very nice ambiance, very cheap for what you get. Personally I think some of the wines could be a bit better with some of the dishes, but this is definitely a place we would go back more often. Love it!!!

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Love the atmosphere at this place. Great food! If you want something closer to fine dining but not too pretentious, this is the place to go.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: What a delicious experience. Menu changes every few weeks, staff is knowledgeable and the food is incredible.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Excellent place, friendly and helpful staff, great food with surprising combinations. It's small and cozy and the owner walks around for a chat and a tip. Located in great street with lots of nice boutique shops close by.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Amazing restaurant. The menu is already decided and the only thing you choose is fish/meat. Great quality. Highly recommended

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: One of my favourite restaurants in Amsterdam. I first discovered Balthazar's Keuken several years ago and I'm glad that the quality of the food, the creative use of local seasonal ingredients, have always been top notch. Prices are reasonable, menu non-complicated and service excellent. Oh and the portions are perfect.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: One of our favorite meals in Amsterdam! The menu changes often (I think every week or so). They serve 5 small plates to start, a choice of main courses, and a dessert. The restaurant is cozy and staff are great!

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: It was definitely different, very nice looking place √†nd good service, the food was nice but not WOW, pr√©sentation wise very nice, taste wise I think we had greater expectations, but it's a place where you definitely have to go at least once and give it a try! The menu changes every two weeks more or less!

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Absolutely delicious. Long story short, we had had a bad day. We came into Balthazar‚Äôs simply because we had made a reservation a few days ago and wanted to keep it. The excellent service and wine slowly brought us out of our bad mood. ‚Ä¶

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: The food was delicious and the service was very friendly. Also the interior is very nice. ‚Ä¶

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: All courses were perfect, professional and kind service, nice wine selection, cool interior.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: If the service had been a little faster, this would have been one of the very best food experience I have had. Pigeon breast was perfect, fixed menu meant food quality was exquisite, and the open kitchen  was both quaint and professional...we loved it!

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: We have really enjoyed every aspect of our dinner. The dishes were creative and flavorful. Nice atmosphere. Loved the open kitchen. The menu changes all the time. There aren‚Äôt many choices, but everything is done very well and with attention to detail. I think it‚Äôs a really good value too. Will definitely go again!

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: They offer a creative 3 course set menu in a small but cozy restaurant with an open kitchen. Great value for money.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Disappointing, we picked a 3-4 course menu but the started was terrible. It was a cold started, and it was kept in the fridge too long and it was not fresh. The staff are nice and friendly. However, We was very shocked  by the low quality of the starter. I would like to highlight that this review is for before Covid time.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: This place is such a lovely little surprise. The service was fantastic and very accomodating with mine & my boyfriends dietary requirements. The main course was delicious but I didn't love all the starters (the crab and the artichoke were ‚Ä¶

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Lovely open kitchen type set up with set menu that was delicious. Really enjoyed the meal and setting and the wait staff were great. We ordered a bottle of wine on their recommendation but it wasn‚Äôt for us, they promptly took it away and replaced and charged us only for half the bottle. Great service.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Daily menu that changes every two weeks. They keep their website updated so you can check the menu ;) You get all the entr√©es which were amazing. (I was happy not to have to choose just one )The only choice you need to make is main dish: ‚Ä¶

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: In this restaurant I had the best dinner in all of Amsterdam. Highly recommended.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text:
Most disappointing dinner ever.
We went for the meat as main dish and it was gross: soft, jelly-like texture, no seasoning and on top of three ravioli; everything was drowning in butter. ‚Ä¶

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Been living here a year - constantly hear this place mentioned (love their more casual sister spot Bar Parry) finally went to check it out and was disappointed. The ambiance is lovely and the staff very competent - even though I got a bit ‚Ä¶

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Friends raved so we tried it and it was great! Start with half dozen small plates on menu that night, then one choice- meat or fish? Everything was fresh, well balance flavor profile, pleasant and friendly young staff. Chunk of Dutch chocolate cake with coffee we ordered. Reasonable value too.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Very good premium food. Small restaurant with a nice atmosphere. But unfortunately the staff where a little off with us, no idea why, and not so chatty; possibly not happy with serving foreign guests in a non-tourist part of the city.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Really enjoyed our time here - started with an appetizer which was five individual little dishes, a nice surprise.  Mains and desserts were great.  Wonderful experience for a reasonable price, will definitely be returning.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: French cuisine with nice touch. Very nice service and lovely ambiance. Very highly recommended.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Good service and very cozy atmosphere - affordable for a three course.  The set menu, though, means you're really taking a chance on all of your meal, and some offerings (quail, half lobster) simply aren't rewarding.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Enjoyed my first dinner in my first trip to  Amsterdam. Great place with good services and food. The nice starters stimulate my appetite and selection of food are fresh with no much seasoning. This enhanced the real food tastes themselves. Recommended to come and try

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Unfortunately not the best experience. We had high expectations because both my fianc√© and I passed by this place every day and from outside everything looked great. The service was good and the people were actually very nice. The issue is ‚Ä¶

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Delicious prix fixe dinner at really good prices ($35ish Euro/pp). Starts with a plate of different appetizers, then main course and dessert. ‚Ä¶

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: I can't give this place a1 star because I'm not sure how the main course taste. The reason why I say this was they had us sitting around for almost an hour with no communication as to what was happening after we placed our order. It was ‚Ä¶

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Great food. Very efficient, knowledgeable and courteous staff.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Pretty basic French food. After hearing good things about Balthazar's, I wasn't impressed with the food they served us. Starter felt uninspired and tasted a bit plain. Main (fish) was acceptable, nothing special. The dessert was very ‚Ä¶

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Outstandingly good cooking, and very good value given the high quality. Provides a set 3-course menu with choice of two main courses. The menu is beautifully constructed. There's real creativity here. Highly recommended.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Friendly, informal, with really good food seemingly cooked with no stress whatsoever. And yes you are pretty much sitting in the kitchen, we certainly could see everything. You don't get much choice - fixed menu with choice of fish or meat ‚Ä¶

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: This place was recommend to me by mutiple people  and have to say I was not disappointed. It has a changing menu so you cant predict what will be served but the setup is the same: 6 small courses to share , a fish or meat main dish and ‚Ä¶

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Balthazar's is a place I'll definitely look up when back in Amsterdam, years from now. ‚Ä¶

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Small place, nice staff and good food. The starters were perfect, Main course was ok. The dessert was too sweet. The price is fair, 35 for the menu + 28 for wine.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Awesome food. It's a menu that changes all the time and you only choose from the fish or meat dish. Good service; we had to be a bit speedy with dinner because of a concert that night and they accomodated us.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Gezellig Restaurant with, wonderful service and amazing food!  Well worth a visit!

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Food is amazing. Very friendly service. But the later the evening and the fuller the restaurant the service is unfortunately slowing down rapidly since there‚Äôs only two waitresses

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Service is not the best and food was OK. Lots of other restaurants with better vakue/service.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: An excellent restaurant. They give several appetizers to share, all of which were great. I then had an incredible duck with potatoes. Highly recommend for an upscale small restaurant.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: This extremely cosy place has never disappointed me - great seasonal dishes, executed well and good service at a very reasonable price. Its why I keep coming back to this place!

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Friendly staff, nice atmosphere, friendly priced,food is not amazing. Ingredients are good but the execution not. Overall an ok experience. ‚Ä¶

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Loved the atmosphere and service. The chef might have had his worst night of his life or something. The food was a mess. I will probably go back to see if it is better.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Great concept, every dish was great. Atmosphere and vibe are excellent. The staff were friendly and helpful, highly recommended.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Great set menu with interesting food on the menu which I am informed changes every 2 weeks. Staff were lovely and accommodated me and the food i couldn't eat whilst pregnant

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Excellent food and service. Four stars because the Champagne and other sparkling wines are not refrigerated.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: The food was good but I was expecting more from here. The appetizers were the most interesting and the mains were delicious, but dessert seemed like a throw away.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Great food, very special flavours, and also very kind service. Prices are very reasonable. Best dinner we had in amstetdam!

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Amazing! Balthazar's Kitchen is a wonderfully unique, little gem that presents an ever changing set menu of mouth-watering delights. The service was excellent as well. Highly recommend it!

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Had dinner here and really good. You only have to choose between meat or fish. Really good and recommended.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Amazing dining experience. My favorite dinner in Amsterdam. Cozy open kitchen restaurant with fixed 3 course meal.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: early and late seating. karen is a wonderful owner, host and creative menu planner. we try to stop in amsterdam where ever we are traveling to stop and eat at balthzar. there is only one meat and one fish menu, but i have never been disappointed.  signed, picky eater

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Quality set menu based on seasonally available products, nice atmosphere, good service. popular but small so you need to book.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Food was not particularly special. Not bad but also not outstanding. Nice atmosphere though. Restaurant is a bit small.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Looks nice, I couldn't taste the food because the kitchen was already closed when we arrived, but the restaurant was actually full of people and the atmosphere was friendly and nice.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Very nice and the food is really good. It may not sit well with some ppl as the menu is not very flexible but what is there is amazing

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Fantastic food with a very novel starter concept. Never seen a more laid back chef, yet all courses were served promptly in a full restaurant.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Service was friendly. The food was nice. Really great value for money. It's preferable to book a table as it's seems always full.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Rediscovered Balthazar after not having been there for years. Concept of mixed starters, 2 main courses to choose from still works well, and the kitchen still makes original choices. We'll be back again soon now that we live in the neighborhood again

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Excellent 3 course menu where you can choose fish or meat.  Great flavours.  Friendly informative service.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: The appetizer was very delicious. What a pity that the main dish was not on the same level. All that comes in our head is 'mainstream'.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Very cosy and down-to-ground place with a good serving at a reasonable price. Good athmosphere, if you don't mind sitting very close to your neighbor.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: ‚Ç¨19.95 for the set menu lunch, it's always something interesting and changes around, really tasty though. Not cheap but great quality

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Will definitely return!  There were a few rough edges that could be improved (eg hot plates) but the food was really very excellent, and the whole atmosphere too,

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Amazing appetizers! Great wine of the week selections.  Leisured dining. Highly recommended.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Fabulous food. Catered for two vegetarians in the party so well. Highly recommended.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Needs reservation. Fish or meat menu. But delicious. Menu changes every few days.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: From starter to coffee uniquely great food. Impeccable service - homely atmosphere.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: The best part about the meal was the bottle of sparkling water. Unfortunately it stopped working mid way through the meal. (it works like a spray)

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Delicious meal, with kind and attentive staff. Truly a delightful evening.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Greatest bottle of Spatburgunder i have ever tasted. Outstanding service and food, lovely little place.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Excellent chef. I can recommend the five course surprise menu.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Always busy and always a surprise. The menu is ever changing and always delicious. Make reservations!

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Great tasting menu

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text:
Just a very different approach to a restaurant. Very entertaining audience. Fine food with a twist and or surprise.
For those who dare.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Food was amazing, a little pricey but it worth

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Incredible food. Great service. Definitely coming back

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Never disappoints! One of our favorites in Amsterdam especially for romantic evenings.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Good food and drinks. Good value for the money. Cozy atmosphere.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Price/Service Relation is top. Good wines...faire priced.....super atmosphere.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Wonderful food, all fixed menu that changes weekly.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Love it here, just check their menu online before you go!

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Mind blowing good!

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: always great & such a nice vibe. The place keeps its strength even after years.

Review Text: Really lovely, attentive and inventive cooking with low-key charm.

Review Text: The entire company felt sick after the dinner. The food was not impressive.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: Very good dutch kitchen restaurant.

Name: Balthazar's Keuken
Review Text: The ambience is truly unique, and kind staff. It‚Äôs one of those places you like to have a cosy night out with your small group of friends or a romantic night out on a date. ‚Ä¶
